name: Dragon Bubble
description:
Join the fun dragon game! Shoot & Pop bubbles in the magical dragon land, solve bubbling puzzles and enjoy a free to play puzzle game! Dragon Bubbles is a fun bubble shooter app, with plenty of challenging levels and awesome quests.

Want to add some magic to your life? Come to visit the fantastic world of dragons and get ready for the adventure of a lifetime! Play the fun-filled Dragon Bubbles game for FREE and discover thousands of addicting puzzle levels, beautiful graphics, and cool boosters.

The magical dragons need your help, their lands have been infested with bubbles, clear them all out! Join the team of heroes, master all the challenges and beat your rivals. Set on an epic journey, explore the magical island and enjoy the most amazing gameplay anywhere and anytime. Play the best bubbles game now and start popping these balloons!


WIN LEVELS IN A GREAT BUBBLE SHOOTER GAME
Thousands of challenging bubble-popping levels are waiting in this amazing bubble shooter free game, are you are you up for the challenge? Tap on the screen to shoot balls, make awesome bubble combinations and plan your moves to clear levels!

PLAY ANYWHERE AND ANYTIME
This exciting balloon popping game is free to download and perfect for the whole family to play and enjoy. No wifi connection is required so you can enjoy an unlimited bubble popping fun online or offline.
DISCOVER EXCITING NEW BUBBLES AND POWER-UPS!

Conquer challenging levels with powerful boosts in this thrilling adventure. Pop 7 bubbles in a row to earn a fireball that will clear your way up to victory. Drop 10 balls or more to get a bomb that will create a big explosion and take out surrounding bubbles.

PLAY WITH FAMILY & FRIENDS!
This incredible puzzle game is suitable for the whole family to play and enjoy. Compete with each other, and see who can clear all the balls first! There is no life or time limit, so you can play as much as you like! Try out this fun bubble game and discover the legends of the dragons. Enjoy thousands of amazing quests that will challenge your mind!


Why You'll Like Dragon Bubbles Game:
+ Thousands of great puzzles and challenges.
+ Free to play dragon game.
+ Cool boosts and rewards.
+ Classic game mode. Enjoy the top bubbles puzzle game!
+ Amazing graphics and designs.
+ No internet connection is required so you can play anytime and anywhere.


If you’re looking for a fun game to play during long car rides, hurry up and get this bubble shooter pop game! This boredom buster will keep you entertained any time!
Enjoy the perfect dragons game experience on your device, download now!
